name: SIDENOR STEEL INDUSTRY S.A.
goal: Sidenor S.A. is a steel products manufacturer offering a full range of high quality and innovative solutions to the demanding needs of our customers worldwide. Our extensive product portfolio including long, flat and downstream steel products in manufactured across nine facilities in Greece, Bulgaria, Romania, FYROM and Australia. Consistent to our vision "to be the leading producer of steel products through our people and our technological excellence" we will continue to grow sustainably, set standards, of excellence, refine our quality, invest and further develop our technical knowledge while expanding our capabilities, increasing our efficiencies and adding exceptional value for customers. Sidenor S.A. has identified six areas of focus: Corporate Governance, its people, health and safety at the workplace, market responsibility, care for the environment and develop harmonious relationships with the local communities where it operates.
